description: Try our easy to follow Feta & Herb Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Feta & Herb Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Oil and line a 900g loaf pan.
Sift together the cornmeal, flour, milk powder, and salt in a large bowl and stir well to combine. Stir in the yeast, sugar, and xanthan gum.
Mix together the eggs, herbs, and water in a separate bowl, add to the dry ingredients, and combine to form a smooth mixture. Beat for 5 minutes, then stir in the feta.
Spoon the mixture into the prepared pan, cover with a clean damp dish towel, and leave in a warm place to rise for about 30 minutes, until the mixture is near the top of the pan.
Place in a preheated oven, 175°C, for about 45 minutes or until the loaf is brown and sounds hollow when tapped on the bottom. Remove from the oven and transfer to a wire rack to cool.
